page.title: 17EXTRACTIVE INDUSTRY - QUARRY
page.content: There is only one working quarry in this area and it is known as Fan Quarry. This quarry has been working for around six hundred years. The materials extracted are mixed aggregates such as chippings and duff, hardcore, agricultural lime and coated macadams. Transportation of the above mentioned materials is by lorry. This quarry employs a workforce of about twenty four. At one time there was a lime kiln at the quarry. There are many disused quarries in the area, but they have been closed for many years. This quarry is situated at Meinciau.
